comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when a storage quota is successfully set. It is commonly displayed in dialogs and notifications after updating storage quotas, ensuring users are informed of the successful completion of the operation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Yaddaş kvotası uğurla təyin olundu' is a somewhat literal and slightly awkward translation. A more natural and idiomatic translation would convey the same meaning more smoothly in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'Yaddaş həddi uğurla qoyuldu' or 'Saxlanma sahəsi limiti təyin edildi.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'kvotası' is a transliteration from English and not a standard Azerbaijani word. While understandable, it's better to use a more accurate Azerbaijani equivalent.

The translation 'ກຳນົດກໍານານບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສຳເລັດແລ້ວ' is a literal translation and sounds awkward. A more natural phrasing for "Storage quota successfully set" would be something like 'ກຳນົດຂອບເຂດບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສຳເລັດແລ້ວ' or 'ຕັ້ງກໍານານບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສຳເລັດແລ້ວ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ກຳນົດຂອບເຂດບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສຳເລັດແລ້ວ' or 'ຕັ້ງກໍານານບ່ອນເກັບຂໍ້ມູນສຳເລັດແລ້ວ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Limit pamięci został pomyślnie ustawiony' directly translates to 'Memory limit was successfully set'. While understandable, 'Storage quota' implies more than just memory. A more accurate translation would reflect this.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Limit przestrzeni dyskowej został pomyślnie ustawiony.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Limită de stocare este stabilită cu succes.' is a literal translation and sounds slightly unnatural in Romanian. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning with better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cota de stocare a fost setată cu succes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ආචයන සලාකය සැකසිණි' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Storage quota successfully set.'  'ආචයන' (aachayana) relates to ritualistic or ceremonial acts, and 'සලාකය' (salakaya) means 'slice' or 'portion.' This combination is nonsensical in the context of storage quotas. The translation needs to convey the concept of setting a storage limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something along the lines of 'ගබඩාවේ ඉඩකට්ටුව සාර්ථකව සකස් කරන ලදි' (Gabadawe idakkuwa saarthakava sakasakaran ladi) which translates to 'Storage quota successfully set'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Складишна квота успешно постављена' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Storage quota successfully set.' The word 'складишна' (skladishna) translates to 'warehouse' or 'storage space' in a general sense, not specifically a storage quota. It's too literal.
